languages.text: "Это займет некоторое время, {name}. Я умею залечивать грубые раны, умею исправлять уродства... однако перешивать заново свои нервные окончания — слишком тонкая и кропотливая работа. С тобой — ни дня без новых вызовов". {n}Последнюю фразу Хейнрикс произносит с мрачной ухмылкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Это займет некоторое время, {name}. Я умею залечивать грубые раны, умею исправлять уродства... однако перешивать заново свои нервные окончания — слишком тонкая и кропотливая работа. С тобой — ни дня без новых вызовов". {n}Последнюю фразу Хейнрикс произносит с мрачной ухмылкой.{/n}

languages.text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это займет некоторое время, {name}. Я умею залечивать грубые раны, умею исправлять уродства... однако перешивать заново свои нервные окончания — слишком тонкая и кропотливая работа. С тобой — ни дня без новых вызовов". {n}Последнюю фразу Хейнрикс произносит с мрачной ухмылкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurements... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

"It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurements... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

"It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurements... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

"It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurements... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

languages.text: “还得花些时间，{name}。治疗严重的伤口与恢复被毁容的部分，这些都在我能力范围之内……可要我从头开始重新制作所有的神经末梢？这种精密与繁复的工作实在是超出了我的能力范围。与你同行的每一天，我都会遇到新的挑战。”{n}海因里希带着严峻的微笑，说出了最后这句话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “还得花些时间，{name}。治疗严重的伤口与恢复被毁容的部分，这些都在我能力范围之内……可要我从头开始重新制作所有的神经末梢？这种精密与繁复的工作实在是超出了我的能力范围。与你同行的每一天，我都会遇到新的挑战。”{n}海因里希带着严峻的微笑，说出了最后这句话。{/n}

languages.original_text: "It will take some time, . I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurements... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

languages.text: «Llevará un tiempo, {name}. Puedo curar heridas graves y corregir desfiguraciones... pero ¿reconstruir mis terminaciones nerviosas de la nada? Un trabajo tan delicado y meticuloso está más allá de mis capacidades. Cada día con usted presenta nuevos retos». {n}Heinrix pronuncia la última frase con una sonrisa sombría.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Llevará un tiempo, {name}. Puedo curar heridas graves y corregir desfiguraciones... pero ¿reconstruir mis terminaciones nerviosas de la nada? Un trabajo tan delicado y meticuloso está más allá de mis capacidades. Cada día con usted presenta nuevos retos». {n}Heinrix pronuncia la última frase con una sonrisa sombría.{/n}

languages.text: 「それには時間がかかるのだ、{name}。痛々しい傷を癒し、醜い姿を修正することはできる…しかし、神経をゼロから作り直す？そのような繊細で骨の折れる仕事は、私の能力を超えている。あなたとの毎日は、新たな挑戦の日々だ」{n}ハインリックスは不敵な笑みを浮かべながら言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それには時間がかかるのだ、{name}。痛々しい傷を癒し、醜い姿を修正することはできる…しかし、神経をゼロから作り直す？そのような繊細で骨の折れる仕事は、私の能力を超えている。あなたとの毎日は、新たな挑戦の日々だ」{n}ハインリックスは不敵な笑みを浮かべながら言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}

languages.text: "Es wird etwas dauern, {name}. Ich kann schwere Wunden heilen, Entstellungen korrigieren ... doch meine Nervenenden von Grund auf neu aufbauen? Solch delikate und akribische Arbeit übersteigt meine Fähigkeiten. Jeder Tag mit Euch bringt neue Herausforderungen mit sich." {n}Beim letzten Satz lächelt Heinrix düster.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es wird etwas dauern, {name}. Ich kann schwere Wunden heilen, Entstellungen korrigieren ... doch meine Nervenenden von Grund auf neu aufbauen? Solch delikate und akribische Arbeit übersteigt meine Fähigkeiten. Jeder Tag mit Euch bringt neue Herausforderungen mit sich." {n}Beim letzten Satz lächelt Heinrix düster.{/n}

"Es wird etwas dauern, {name}. Ich kann schwere Wunden heilen, Entstellungen korrigieren ... doch meine Nervenenden von Grund auf neu aufbauen? Solch delikate und akribische Arbeit übersteigt meine Fähigkeiten. Jeder Tag mit Euch bringt neue Herausforderungen mit sich." {n}Beim letzten Satz lächelt Heinrix düster.{/n}

languages.text: « Non, {name}. Ce processus va prendre un certain temps. Je peux soigner des blessures graves et corriger une défiguration... mais recréer de zéro mes terminaisons nerveuses ? C'est un travail délicat et minutieux qui va bien au-delà de mes capacités. Chaque jour passé à vos côtés amène son lot de défis, » {n}conclut Heinrix avec un sourire lugubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non, {name}. Ce processus va prendre un certain temps. Je peux soigner des blessures graves et corriger une défiguration... mais recréer de zéro mes terminaisons nerveuses ? C'est un travail délicat et minutieux qui va bien au-delà de mes capacités. Chaque jour passé à vos côtés amène son lot de défis, » {n}conclut Heinrix avec un sourire lugubre.{/n}

languages.text: "İyileşmem zaman alacak elbet {name}. Derin yaralarımı kapatır, deformasyonları düzelirim. Harap olmuş sinirleri sıfırdan oluşturmaksa... Böylesine incelik ve titizlik isteyen iş, beni de aşar. Seninle geçen her günüm yepyeni bir çetin sınav." {n}Heinrix, son cümleyi yüzünde acı bir tebessümle söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It will take some time, {name}. I can heal grievous wounds and correct disfigurement... but remake my nerve endings from scratch? Such delicate and painstaking work is beyond my capabilities. Every day with you brings new challenges." {n}Heinrix delivers the last part with a grim smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İyileşmem zaman alacak elbet {name}. Derin yara kapanır, bozulan yer düzelir ancak harap olmuş sinirlerimi baştan yapmak... Böylesi acılı ve ince iş beni de aşar. Seninle geçen her günüm ayrı bir eziyet." {n}Heinrix, son kısmı yüzünde acı bir tebessümle söylüyor.{/n}
